Q1.Question: What do I need to be able to vote in the upcoming elections?
Q1.Info:
Only those that meet all 4 criteria are eligible to vote!
If you have registered to vote, you can verfiy your regsitration online at 'voters.inecnigeria.org'.

Q2.Question: What do I need to verify my registration online?
Q2.Info: You only need tour name and either your date of birth or your Voter Identification Number to verfiy your voter's registartion. It's completely free and does not require any other personal information.

Q3.Question: Where should I go to vote on election day?
options: the polling unit where I am registered
the polling station where I am registered
Q3.Info: Make sure yo go to the polling unit where your name is on the voters register, then make your way to your assigned polling station
